overview:
Web business professional with over a decade of experience in the online and mobile world with expertise in Web Analytics, Online Marketing and Monetization and Business Analysis. Specialties

I have over 10 years experience in Online Advertising from Overture, Yahoo, and Microsoft. Highly skilled in paid search and SEO, display advertising as well as web analytics. Expert in business analysis for web companies having both performed in-depth analysis as well as created and mananged highly sophisticated analysis departments within both media and lead generation businesses.
